title: bootstrap: segmentation fault during build
body:
I'm trying to build from source on this system: Linux Synology 3.2.40 #5022 SMP PREEMPT Wed Jan 7 14:19:42 CST 2015 i686 GNU /Linux synology_evansport_214play And for building I'm running: 

    ~/temp/go-go1.4/src # sh all.bash
    # Building C bootstrap tool.
    cmd/dist
    Segmentation fault (core dumped)
    ~/temp/go-go1.4/src #
The same thing happens for make.bash. Any ideas what's happening?
